key.name: server-url
key.description: The base URL (including protocol) of the self-hosted Uptime Kuma instance.

key.name: status-page-slug
key.description: Optional public status page slug to request summary data from.

key.name: monitor-ids
key.description: Comma separated list of monitor IDs to display. Leave empty to show all monitors returned by the API.

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Number of seconds between refreshes of the status indicator.
